body_html:
It will still be useful in scenarios where you don't need the gradient. As a workaround I'd suggest enabling soft placement so the gradient ops can be placed on CPU.

I did get some CUDA kernel launch errors with the new implementation but that would be a totally separate issue. Still haven't had time to prepare a proper bug report (it could have been fixed in the meantime anyway)
